title: [Skin Concept] Saturday Morning Syndra
body:
Thread: 
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3956372

We all know Syndra needs a new skin eventually. Why not give the Dark Sovereign a nice Legendary skin that shows us her lighter side? :) Ever wonder what your favorite champions did when they weren't kicking ass and taking names?

The evil Syndra sleeps too. And sometimes evil sleeps in. :)

http://i.imgur.com/tpOkcoS.jpg

ADDED:
http://i.imgur.com/AfMxAA8.jpg

replies.body: Or kleptomania Synda in this case because she's got a bunch of other people's stuff!
IronStylus please let this happen! She is such a serious champ she needs a joking skin like this. I would buy it in a heart beat at Legendary price!

Syndra is one of the newer champions that has been around long enough to warrant a new skin. :) Volleyball Syndra would be neat, or Dodgeball Syndra too. But I thought this would be neat because it also involved more room for creativity.

If you can dodge Heimerdinger's Wrench,  
you can dodge Syndra's balls!
Oh wow. I agree, volley ball Syndra sounds good. Her E coould be a net throwing the volley balls at the enemy. Sounds really good!
Yoga pants for any female champ would be awesome... Just sayin.
Instead of Balls she'd throw around Plushies ! :D
Haha, I love that death animation. Riot pls, I'd so buy it at legendary price.
Oh god this is awesome lol
I added a new picture for some ideas involving the animations. :)
